jobTitle.title: Website Developer
jobTitle.personalStatement: I value and understand the need for dedication, commitment and hard work in order to progress and ultimately succeed.

about.title: I am a 25-year-old mother of two, living in Retreat, Cape Town. I absolutely love my role as a mother and thrive in creative environments. During my time in the Call Center Customer Service industry, I developed an interest in the technical field, which led me to apply for a technical associate role. While working in this field, I discovered a passion for IT, particularly in coding and the hardware and software aspects of technology. Relocating is also on my checklist, as I would love to explore various parts of South Africa and the world while maintaining job security, especially since I have never been outside of Cape Town. I consider myself an ambivert; I enjoy my downtime but also love interacting with teams. This balance makes me an ideal team member who is also comfortable working independently.

education.description: Intensive 6 month web development training for career preparation.
It is a comprehensive education and practical training program for diverse careers in the maritime industry.
Final year of high school career

experience.duties: Handling live contacts via Phone , Chat and Email. Assisting manager's with weekly stats reports and one on one coaching.

Assisting Customer Service Associates with their customers via Chat. As an advanced technician I am the last point of contact. I handled contacts via chat , phone and email. This role also required me to document my monthly stats and indicate areas of opportunity.

Researching business location , assets , company status and valid contact numbers in order to chase outstanding debt. Once the business has paid up their debt we remove the account from the system. However , if we unable to settle an agreement we either disconnect the meter or forward the account to an external debt collection agency.
Designing custom templates to be printed on garments. Printed custom templates on garments. I am still pursuing this on a part-time bases now.

Assisting Customer Service Associates with their customers via Chat. As a customer service resolution specialist I am the last point of contact. I handled contacts via chat , phone and email. This role also required me to document my monthly stats and indicate areas of opportunity.

Assisting customers via calls, live chats and emails. To be customer focused and solve the customers query as a whole. Being a point of contact within they team. Duties also included assisting team manager with mining and peer to peer coaching.
Assisting clients via phone with booking , editing their flights.
Assisting customers via calls, live chats and emails. To be customer focused and solve the customers query as a whole.
Planning lessons for Grade 6 learners. Setting up the class room. Teaching for an hour after school. Marking tests and giving results on time. We also had to attend workshops and math camps.

skills.title: HTML
skills.description: I have an intermediate skill level in HTML. I create well-structured, semantic web pages. I ensure accessibility and SEO best practices.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: My CSS skills are at an intermediate level. I use advanced techniques like flexbox and grid layout. My designs are responsive and visually appealing.

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.description: My CSS skills are at an intermediate level. I use advanced techniques like flexbox and grid layout. My designs are responsive and visually appealing.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: I have an intermediate level of proficiency in JavaScript. I write clean, efficient code and use ES6+ features. I handle DOM manipulation, events, and API interactions confidently.

skills.title: VueJs
skills.description: I am a beginner in Vue.js. I understand the core concepts and can build simple applications. I am eager to learn more advanced features and best practices.

skills.title: Canva
skills.description: I am proficient at an intermediate level in Canva, using its tools to create visually appealing graphics and presentations. I can design social media posts, posters, and marketing materials efficiently. My skills include customizing templates, adding text and graphics, and exporting designs for various digital and print formats.

skills.title: Figma
skills.description: I have intermediate skills in Figma, proficient in designing and prototyping user interfaces and experiences. I can create interactive prototypes and collaborate effectively with team members. My understanding of Figma's design tools and components helps me streamline workflow and maintain consistency in design projects.

skills.title: Adobe Photoshop
skills.description: I possess intermediate proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, allowing me to edit photos and create graphics with confidence. I am skilled in using layers, masks, and filters to enhance images. My knowledge includes basic photo retouching, compositing, and color adjustments, enabling me to produce polished visuals for both digital and print media.

softskills.title: Communication
softskills.description: I excel in clear and effective communication, both written and verbal. I can convey complex ideas succinctly and tailor my message to diverse audiences. My active listening skills ensure understanding and foster collaborative environments.

softskills.title: Listening
softskills.description: I excel in active listening, ensuring full comprehension and engagement in conversations. I can interpret both verbal and non-verbal cues, fostering deeper understanding and connection. My ability to listen empathetically and without judgment enhances communication and collaboration.

softskills.title: Time Management
softskills.description: I am highly proficient in managing my time and prioritizing tasks effectively. I consistently meet deadlines while maintaining high-quality work. My organizational skills and ability to delegate ensure productivity and balance.

softskills.title: Problem-Solving
softskills.description: I possess advanced problem-solving skills, allowing me to tackle complex challenges effectively. I approach problems analytically and creatively, identifying root causes and devising strategic solutions. My perseverance and adaptability ensure successful outcomes.

softskills.title: Teamwork
softskills.description: I thrive in collaborative settings and am skilled at fostering teamwork. I bring out the best in others by encouraging open communication and mutual respect. My ability to navigate group dynamics helps achieve common goals efficiently.

testimonials.name: Imaraan
testimonials.quote: Hardworking is a term that comes to mind when I think of Nicki. She's someone whose willing to learn and improve herself, even going the extra mile when things are stacked against her. Nice smile and soft voice makes her pleasant to be around and she has the knowledge to go with it. Overall a great person, great personality with good potential and capabilities.

testimonials.name: Robyn
testimonials.quote: A very driven individual, Nicki never fails to stay curious and persistent in her work. Communicating well, with an attentive ear in return, comes naturally to her. She works efficiently independantly and in a team, and in her endeavors.

testimonials.name: Shane
testimonials.quote: Nicki is a hard working indiviual that gives her all when it comes to her work. She is dedicated to everything she does and always makes the extra effort to achieve each of her goals set out for herself.

testimonials.name: Nikki
testimonials.quote: Nicki is nothing short of a breathe of fresh air! She is hardworking, determined and always looking for a new challenge. With this, she always ensures that she completes her tasks with precision and lends a helping hand to those who need it.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quote: Nicki is a highly creative, well-behaved, and dedicated individual who thrives on collaborating with her peers and excels at working on project assignments. She has acquired various skills and tools, including HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Figma, and VS Code. I am pleased to introduce her to you as an exceptional candidate and developer. What I appreciate about her is that she pays attention to details. I am pleased to introduce her to you as an exceptional candidate and developer.

testimonials.name: Anushqa
testimonials.quote: Nicki is an inspiration for all those around her. She's an extremely dedicated  and hard-working person, who never crumbles in the face of adversity . Her creative nature and intelligence is what sets her apart from her peers. She's always positive and constantly enlighten those around her, therefore any workplace would be lucky to have her as part of their team.
